title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 462.2 - Notice of right of appeal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 462.2 - Notice of right of appeal

State Regulations

The decision shall be accompanied by a notice of the right
of appeal therefrom and the method by which such appeal may be
taken. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
462.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
